front: What areas are mandatory in the tile layout?
Which of the following components are part of the SAP Fiori Launchpad?
Which of the following make up the configuration of a tile for launching an SAP Fiori app of type SAPUI5 in the SAP Fiori launchpad designer?
Which of the following layouts, are described in version 1.48 of the Guidelines?
When should you not use the dynamic page layout?
back: You are planning to use SAP fiori elements, such as the list report, analytical list page, overview page, or object page, which already incorporates the dynamic page layout. You want to implement an initial page or object page floor plan these floor plans already incorporate snapping header and footer toolbar features, the behavior is comparable to the dynamic page behavior, but the technical foundation is different. You only need to display a small amount of information, in this case use a dialog instead, if you cannot avoid using the dynamic page layout, use letterboxing to mitigate the issue.

front: How many columns are supported by the flexible column layout?
When do you have to implement the SAP Fiori floorplan initial page?
back: The initial page floorplan is used when the user needs to navigate to a single object

front: When do you not use the overview page floorplan?

options.A: A high-level or birds-eye view of an application content is sufficient
options.B: You want to display a collection of items and process them or delegate them to someone else
options.C: You want to show information about one object only. In this case, use the object page instead.
options.D: You just represent one application and less than three cards

front: What are the main characteristics of a search field in SAP Fiori element-based applications?

options.D: Finds a keyword in multiply fields

options.B: Either automates or provides self-service response
options.C: Used to increase the development effort
options.D: Used for ABAP development with Eclipse Oxygen
